dataIdInfo.idAbs: Use the Feature ID generator on any 3DCIM database to populate the natural key field with a unique identifier following the pattern FeatureclassName/Type/LocalID, using a high-low-sequence algorithm.

tool.name: FeatureIdGenerator
tool.toolboxalias: ArcGIS for 3D Cities Database Schema Tools

param.name: in_gdb
param.dialogReference: The geodatabase which to scan and for which to generate IDs.

param.name: generation_method
param.dialogReference: The ID generation method. At this tage, only HI-LO is supported. HI-LO is a key generation mehtod that works with batches of size "HI".

tool.summary: Use the Feature ID generator on any 3DCIM database to populate the natural key field with a unique identifier following the pattern FeatureclassName/Type/LocalID, using a high-low-sequence algorithm.
tool.usage: Use the Feature ID generator on any 3DCIM database to populate the natural key field with a unique identifier following the pattern FeatureclassName/Type/LocalID, using a high-low-sequence algorithm.
